title: Why you shouldn't Play with your friends.

embed.description: I played League of Legends... with my immature friends... Lessons have been learnt... Maybe.... *LANGUAGE WARNING* Things get spoken about that some people may find innapropriate Kids should not be watching this one sorry. Play League of Legends for Free! http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/?ref=54d9edc8ba03c207048320 Find me online! Facebook: http://facebook.com/whitee46 Twitter: http://twitter.com/whitee46 Twitch: http://twitch.tv/whitee46 Check out Game4Charity!

body: I'm new to the whole editing thing so quality is growing. I always play with my friends and things get out of hand quick. They said I should be recording these for safe keep, so I uploaded to YouTube. Now I want to know what people think? The quality is getting better and audio is being fixed aswell. but yeah. Thankyou for watching.
